attributes.action: Have a DNA data record of every person in the UK, and put it on ID cards,murderers,rapists,etc would be behind bars the next day safer UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: police work would be much simpler take dna from crime area look up address and picture, go and arrest criminal, or is this against someones human rites to be arrested for a crime,or should we leave it like it is now and allow murders to kill several times robbers and rapists to deverstate peoples lives and police to spend somtimes years on a single crime,it cant be against our human rites to each have a code that says im innocent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
